title: Microsoft 365 admin center: 4-week view for Microsoft 365 monitoring Preview
description: Microsoft 365 monitoring allows you to view near real-time activity metrics and compare these with activity from the previous week.  This can help you assess whether a service incident is impacting users in your organization.  Monitoring reports will be enhanced to show the current week plus up to 3 prior weeks, to better help you understand typical activity levels for your organization.      Microsoft 365 monitoring is currently in preview and enabled for customers with 5,000 or more Microsoft 365 subscriptions licenses.
